title: Ramping up A on multiple Pools
body:
*This motion is in regards to the general maintenance of mStable's contracts.*

It is suggested to ramp up the A value for feeder Pools and mAssets in the following manner:

```markup
| Pool           	| Start A 	| End A 	|
|----------------	|---------	|-------	|
| GUSD - mUSD    	| 225     	| 450   	|
| BUSD - mUSD    	| 500     	| 1000  	|
| hBTC - mBTC    	| 325     	| 650   	|
| tBTC - mBTC    	| 175     	| 350   	|
| mUSD - Polygon 	| 700      	| 1000  	|
```

Increasing the A value makes the curve "flatter", thus producing lower slippage swaps.

The ramp-up period will be 3 days.

**Should we ramp-up the `A` value over 3 days to the values specified in the table?**
author: 0xE76Be9C1e10910d6Bc6b63D8031729747910c2f6
